title: Define Gaming - Your Experience, Your Community

embed.description: Have an idea or something on your mind that's bugging you about Define Gaming? Voice your opinions here. The staff is always looking to improve our member's experience!

body:
**Define Gaming [DG]**

http://www.define-gaming.com

**Background**

Define Gaming is a multigaming community centered around constant improvement based off member feedback and strong admin-to-community communication. Founded in October 2015 by leaders who have had years of clan/community management, Define Gaming is already looking strong with over 100 members, an active forum, and a Teamspeak3 server. With much persistence and dedication, we look forward to the future and always aim higher than everywhere else to make our members' experiences the best they can possibly be. It's up to you to define what you want your gaming experience to be!
 

**Rules & Member Complaints**

In Define Gaming, we want to ensure that everyone has an enjoyable experience. Define Gaming has a set of rules and a member complaint system to hold people to respectable standards and punish those who choose not to meet them. Our rule list can be found at here and our member complaint system can be found at here.

 

**Member Ranks & Staff**

We believe in rewarding members for their activity in our community and on our forums. Define Gaming has a simple user ranking system for members that put their time into Define Gaming, along with various staff positions for people who want to improve Define Gaming, as well as help it grow. Each user rank encompasses different rewards, check here for more information.

 

**How to Join Define Gaming**

Joining Define Gaming is simple, as we understand people want to jump in game as soon as possible. Visit our website, create an account, authorize your email, then post an introduction in our Introductions forum. From there, a staff member will approve your introduction and welcome you to the community. Feel free to write as much as you'd like for your introduction. Keep it short, follow our suggested template, or freestyle, which ever defines you best. From that point forward, a staff member from your respective main game will add you and do their best to help you get started in Define Gaming. If you have any questions, check the references section below.

 

**References** - For more information, please contact the following people in-game, here, or on our website:

{{champion:19}} [DG]Wardy - Community Director - Ingame Name: **DG Wardy
**
{{champion:17}} [DG]Mio - Community Director - Ingame Name: **DG Mio**

{{champion:412}} [DG]djediw - Recruitment Organizer - Ingame Name: **DG Mio**

{{champion:77}} [DG]Jepman - Recruitment Organizer/Event Organizer - Ingame Name: **DG Jepman**

replies.body: Tried creating an account a few hours ago, still haven't received confirmation email. How long does it take?

> [{quoted}](name=Best Burrito AU,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-12T00:40:13.844+0000)
>
> Tried creating an account a few hours ago, still haven't received confirmation email. How long does it take?

It should be almost instantly sent friend. If it isn't in your inbox try checking your other folders. :)

> [{quoted}](name=DG Jepman,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-12T05:05:56.884+0000)
>
> It should be almost instantly sent friend. If it isn't in your inbox try checking your other folders. :)

I've checked my inbox and other folders multiple times and I've had the email resent thrice and there is still nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Burrito AU,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-11-12T06:18:12.847+0000)
>
> I've checked my inbox and other folders multiple times and I've had the email resent thrice and there is still nothing.

Jump on Teamspeak and we will get the situation sorted when you are next online :)
Wonderful Community, They gave me Tim-Tams & even provided me with a bottle of sacrilegious glue that i still use to this day ;), 10/10 Would join!
Got some awesome events coming up soon

> [{quoted}](name=DG Wardy,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-11-16T08:06:05.443+0000)
>
> Got some awesome events coming up soon

Such as?

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-11-16T19:50:43.657+0000)
>
> Such as?

There's a Gamenight being held this Saturday. The gamemode is still being decided by a poll that end around midnight tonight. The link to the event is: http://www.define-gaming.com/index.php?/calendar/event/11-lol-oce-gamenight/

> [{quoted}](name=DG Jepman,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2015-11-17T03:10:57.333+0000)
>
> There's a Gamenight being held this Saturday. The gamemode is still being decided by a poll that end around midnight tonight. The link to the event is:

Not sure what the deal is but i clicked on the link and my work computer went into blue screen defender mode. Thanks for the reply though.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-17T03:48:39.247+0000)
>
> Not sure what the deal is but i clicked on the link and my work computer went into blue screen defender mode. Thanks for the reply though.

I'm not really sure what blue screen defender mode is, but if it's what is referred to as "The blue screen of death" then I think that's normally a hardware issue.

> [{quoted}](name=DG Jepman,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=00080000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-17T04:48:18.207+0000)
>
> I'm not really sure what blue screen defender mode is, but if it's what is referred to as "The blue screen of death" then I think that's normally a hardware issue.

Oh. not blue screen of death. It was saying the link was corrupted wouldn't let me access it and shut down all processes to protect the system. Probs just an overprotective thing from IT...

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=000800000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-17T05:18:38.580+0000)
>
> Oh. not blue screen of death. It was saying the link was corrupted wouldn't let me access it and shut down all processes to protect the system. Probs just an overprotective thing from IT...

Most likely. If you are trying to access it from work, who knows what kind of restrictions they have set. If the problems persists at home though, please let us know.

> [{quoted}](name=DG Wardy,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gshcAYUF,comment-id=0008000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-19T23:21:19.457+0000)
>
> Most likely. If you are trying to access it from work, who knows what kind of restrictions they have set. If the problems persists at home though, please let us know.

Works fine from home. cheers.
Tons of Damage, approves this clan.
Rally good gaming community, lots of gamenights and a good bunch of people in general
There's a Noxus vs Demacia Gamenight being held tonight. Sign up on the website and come have some fun!
Can confirm this is a quality community with a large and friendly player-base. :D

Loving the growth so far, come join the fun!
